# Fxns
```{r}
formTime <- function(time) {
  formattedTime <- paste0(floor(as.numeric(time) / 60), ":", (str_pad(floor(as.numeric(time) %% 60), width = 2, side = "left", pad = "0")))
  return(formattedTime)
}

getPL <- function(plURL, year, region) {
  # Accountinf for conversions
  pl <- read_html(plURL) %>%
    html_table()
  
  for(i in 7:14)
  {
    results <- as.data.frame(pl[i])
    
    # Subset to only conversion times
    results <- results %>%
      select(ATHLETE, TEAM, TIME) %>%
      mutate(
        YEAR = year,
        TEAM = toupper(TEAM),
        GENDER = case_when(
          i %% 2 == 0 ~ 'F',
          T ~ 'M'
        ),
        EVENT = case_when(
          i == 7 | i == 8 ~ '800m',
          i == 9 | i == 10 ~ '1500m',
          i == 11 | i == 12 ~ '5k',
          T ~ '10k'
        )
      ) %>% 
      group_by(GENDER, EVENT) %>%
      arrange(TIME, .by_group = TRUE) %>%
      mutate(
        PLACE = 1:n(), 
        REGION = region
      )
    
    # Handle times
    results$TIME = sapply(results$TIME, handleTimes)
    results$NAME = sapply(results$ATHLETE, createName)
    
    # Rearrange columns
    results <- results %>%
      select(YEAR, EVENT, TIME, PLACE, NAME, GENDER, TEAM, REGION)
  
    if(exists("full_results"))
    {
      full_results <- rbind(full_results, results)
    }
    else
    {
      full_results <- results  
    }
    
  }
  
  # Return data
  return(full_results)
  
}
```

# Grab 32nd Times
```{r}
cuts <- df %>%
  filter(PLACE < 49)

# Split into east/west, men/women
east_men <- cuts %>%
  filter(GENDER == 'M' & REGION == 'East')
east_women <- cuts %>%
  filter(GENDER == 'W' & REGION == 'East')
west_men <- cuts %>%
  filter(GENDER == 'M' & REGION == 'West')
west_women <- cuts %>%
  filter(GENDER == 'W' & REGION == 'West')

men <- cuts %>%
  filter(GENDER == 'M')

women <- cuts %>%
  filter(GENDER == 'W')
```

```{r}
men_event <- men %>% filter(EVENT == '10k')

men_event$formatted_time <- sapply(men_event$TIME, formTime)

ggplot(men_event, aes(YEAR, -TIME, color = REGION)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

```{r}
top_32 <- df %>%
  filter(PLACE <= 32)

mid_48 <- df %>%
  filter(PLACE > 32 & PLACE <= 48)

top <- df %>%
  filter(PLACE <= 48)

top_top <- levels(as.factor(top$TEAM))

top_teams <- levels(as.factor(top_32$TEAM))
top_teams <- unique(top_teams)

mid_teams <- levels(as.factor(mid_48$TEAM))

top_df <- as.data.frame(top_teams)
mid_df <- as.data.frame(mid_teams)

unq_teams <- mid_df %>%
  filter(!(mid_teams %in% top_df$top_teams))
```
